job.title: Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence Software Engineer - Senior level (Remote- WFH)
job.description: The world isnt standing still and neither is Allstate Were moving quickly looking across our businesses and brands and taking bold steps to better serve customers evolving needs Thats why now is an exciting time to join our team Youll have opportunities to take risks challenge the status quo and shape the future for the greater goodltbrgtltbrgtYoull do all this in an environment of excellence and the highest ethical standards  a place where values such as integrity inclusive diversity and accountability are paramount We empower every employee to lead drive change and give back where they work and live Our people are our greatest strength and we work as one team in service of our customers and communitiesltbrgtltbrgtEverything we do at Allstate is driven by a shared purpose to protect people from lifes uncertainties so they can realize their hopes and dreams For more than 89 years weve thrived by staying a step ahead of whatevers coming next  to give customers peace of mind no matter what changes they face We acted with conviction to advocate for seat belts air bags and graduated driving laws We help give survivors of domestic violence a voice through financial empowerment Weve been an industry leader in pricing sophistication telematics digital photo claims and more recently device and identity protection We are the Good Hands We dont follow the trends We set themltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtCompensation DataltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe compensation range for this role is in the 130150K range with a 10 bonus and the final salary offered will be based on skills and experienceltbrgtltbrgtltugtltbrgtltulgtltligtThis is a remote home based roleltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtJob SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe world isnt standing still and neither is Allstate Were moving quickly looking across our businesses and brands and taking bold steps to better serve customers evolving needs Thats why now is an exciting time to join our team As a leader in a corporation with 83000 employees and agency force members youll have a hand in transforming not only Allstate but a dynamic industry Youll have opportunities to take risks challenge the status quo and shape the future for the greater goodltbrgtltbrgtYoull do all this in an environment of excellence and the highest ethical standards  a place where values such as integrity inclusive diversity and accountability are paramount We empower every employee to lead drive change and give back where they work and live Our people are our greatest strength and we work as one team in service of our customers and communitiesltbrgtltbrgtEverything we do at Allstate is driven by a shared purpose to protect people from lifes uncertainties so they can realize their hopes and dreams For 90 years weve thrived by staying a step ahead of whatevers coming next  to give customers peace of mind no matter what changes they face We acted with conviction to advocate for seat belts air bags and graduated driving laws We help give survivors of domestic violence a voice through financial empowerment Weve been an industry leader in pricing sophistication telematics digital photo claims and more recently device and identity protection We are the Good Hands We dont follow the trends We set themltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob Summary ContltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtThis is a remote home based roleltbrgtltligtltulgtAs Allstates Technology Innovation Forward Engineering team we believe in the ability to compete and thrive in the digital age by quickly responding to market changes and emerging opportunities with innovative business solutionsltbrgtltbrgtThis expert role will be responsible for multiple major technical aspects and forward engineering in the field of machine learning information retrieval artificial intelligence natural language processing and ontology engineering technologies Plays a key role in the vision and realization of cuttingedge technical capabilities into business applications and solutionsltbrgtltbrgtWere looking for an experienced Applied Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence person that will be responsible for researching designing and building various scales and complexity systems by implementing supervised and unsupervised machinelearning techniques This individual will apply technologies and methodologies associated with machine learning information retrieval artificial intelligence natural language processing andor ontology engineering technologies Candidates for this job will work both individually and with small teams to envision and realize cuttingedge ideas through rapid prototyping development and deploymentltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtKey ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtLead Applied Machine Learning software engineering technical competencyltligtltligtIdentify research and realize key machine learning technical capabilities in the industryltligtltligtLead design and build mid to high complexity machine learning systemsltligtltligtbuilding data pipelines in getting the data required to build and evaluate ML modelsltligtltligtLeverage continuous integration and continuous deployment best practices including test automation and monitoring to ensure successful deployment of ML models and application codeltligtltligtCollaborate as part of a crossfunctional Agile team to create and enhance software that enables stateoftheart next generation big data and machine learning applications ltligtltligtApply applicable policies and standards while working toward specific objectiveltligtltligtIndependently directs implementation of new initiatives for machine learning technology solutions ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtJob QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree MS is preferred in Computer ScienceEngineering or a related quantitative disciplineltligtltligtMinimum of 7 years full time handson software engineering experience ltligtltligtMinimum of 35 years full time handson machine learning or artificial intelligence software engineering experienceltligtltligt3 years of experience with programming languages such as Python JavaltligtltligtExperience in deploying machine learning models in microservice architecture on a cloud environmentltligtltligtExperience in building models for deep learning speech recognition and natural language processing systemsltligtltligtExperience using frameworks for machine learning and data science like scikitlearn keras pandas numpy XGBoost TensorFlow pytorchltligtltligtExperience of software delivery practices including Git and CICD tools ltbrgtltligtltulgtThe candidates offered this position will be required to submit to a background investigation which includes a drug screenltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtGood Work Good Life Good Hands ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAs a Fortune 100 company and industry leader we provide a competitive salary  but thats just the beginning Our Total Rewards package also offers benefits like tuition assistance medical and dental insurance as well as a robust pension and 401k Plus youll have access to a wide variety of programs to help you balance your work and personal life  including a generous paid time off policy ltugtFor a full description of Allstates benefits visit allstatejobsbenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtLearn more about life at Allstate Connect with us on Twitter Facebook Instagram and LinkedIn or watch a videoltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAllstate generally does not ProgramsltbrgtltbrgtTo view the FMLA poster click here This poster summarizing the major provisions of the Family and Medical Leave Act FMLA and telling employees how to file a complaintltbrgtltbrgtIt is the Companys policy to employ the best qualified individuals available for all jobs Therefore any discriminatory action taken on account of an employees ancestry age color disability genetic information gender gender identity gender expression sexual and reproductive health decision marital status medical condition military or veteran status national origin race include traits historically associated with race including but not limited to hair texture and protective hairstyles religion including religious dress sex or sexual orientation that adversely affects an employees terms or conditions of employment is prohibited This policy applies to all aspects of the employment relationship including but not limited to hiring training salary administration promotion job assignment benefits discipline and separation of employmentltbrgtltbrgtltugt
